definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
lit. to lie on firewood and taste gall (idiom); fig. suffering patiently, but firmly resolved on revenge
to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)

sentences.english: The pain of biliary colic is occasionally in the epigastrium .
sentences.chinese: 膽絞痛的疼痛有時出現在上腹。

sentences.english: Laxative, gall bladder, typhoid, jaundice, improves appetite.
sentences.chinese: 潤腸通便，膽，傷寒，黃疸，改善食慾。

sentences.english: The hazard of waste water from silvering blanks of vacuum bottles as well as its sources were described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了保溫瓶膽鍍銀廢水的來源及其危害。

sentences.english: Surgical management of biliary fistulas is associated with high morbidity and mortality.
sentences.chinese: 膽瘻的外科處理有着很高的發病率與死亡率。

sentences.english: Objective To study the problems of surgical treatment of senile biliary cholelithiasis and biliary infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討老年人膽石症膽感染外科的治療狀況。

sentences.english: Results The major reason of the senile cholangitis was gallstone disease.
sentences.chinese: 結果老年性膽管炎主要病因爲膽繫結石。

sentences.english: Therefore this study demonstrated an alternative way of anesthesia effect to relieve biliary colic pain by acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 因此可作爲針刺緩解膽絞痛的有效選穴。

definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
